trans-unit.source:
Hej %firstNameHR%,;br>
Your candidate submission has been received. Due to data privacy regulations, the candidate will receive a link to confirm their application before our recruiters can review it.
Thank you for your continued support.
br>Best Regards,
Your Transport Talent Team

trans-unit.target: The candidate has confirmed the application for the position "%position%".

trans-unit.source:
Hej %firstNameHR%,;br>
The candidate has confirmed thier application for the position: "%position%". Our recruiters are curretly reviewing the application. Kindly check %jobTitle%" with the status "%applicationStatus% to follow the application process.
br>Best Regards,
Your Transport Talent Team
